explains: n. 母性，母亲身份；妇产科
wordGroup: maternity insurance 生育保险；产妇保险
maternity hospital 产科医院；妇产科医院
maternity and child care 妇幼保健

sentences.en: It's very difficult to demote somebody who has been filling in during maternity leave.
sentences.cn: 给替代歇产假的人降职是很难的。

sentences.en: To qualify for maternity leave you must have worked for the same employer for two years.
sentences.cn: 你必须为同一雇主工作两年才有资格休产假。

sentences.en: My wife's maternity leave is close to an end.
sentences.cn: 我妻子的产假快结束了。
